mdRecord.dcterms:title: [Map of Boston]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Williams, Richard, active 1750-1776
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Ink and watercolor manuscript map and key. Map shows fortifications and rough features of the peninsula of Boston. Key indicates the order of battle of British troops. The disposition of troops on July 17th, 1775 was possibly intended to be added to the map.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Boston (Mass.)--History--Siege, 1775-1776--Maps--Early works to 1800
Boston (Mass.)--History--Revolution, 1775-1783--Maps--Early works to 1800
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Richard H. Brown Revolutionary War Map Collection
